name: sca-recipe
description: Easily Create and Share Delicious Recipes with the Newest WordPress Recipe Plugin
author: Scalater Team

scripts.prune: rimraf .codeclimate.yml .git .github .gitignore .travis.yml .editorconfig .eslintignore .eslintrc.js composer.json phpcs.xml phpmd.xml webpack.mix.js composer.lock package-lock.json
